price: (Yaitu) orang-orang yang mentaati perintah Allah dan rasul-Nya sesudah mereka mendapat luka (dalam peperangan Uḥud).  Bagi orang-orang yang berbuat kebaikan di antara mereka dan yang bertakwa ada pahala yang besar.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لِلَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡقَرۡحُۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna is'tajābū lillahi wal-rasūli min baʿdi mā aṣābahumu al-qarḥu lilladhīna aḥsanū min'hum wa-ittaqaw ajrun ʿaẓīmun
